```{r}

source('GET_VARS.R')

files <- dir(here("ballet_990_released_20230208"),
              full.names = TRUE)

sched_d <- map_df(files, ~{
                    get_df(schedule = 'd',
                           filename = .x) } )

all_sched_d <- map(files, ~get_all_children(filename = .x, 
                                                    xpath =  "//IRS990ScheduleD"))

all_sched_d <- all_sched_d %>% unlist() %>% unique()


tibble(var = all_sched_d) %>%
  filter(grepl("CYM|CY", var)) %>% View()




sched_d %>%
  select(matches("CY|CM")) %>%
  glimpse()
```
